creator: the.webmaestro@gmail.com
text:
I'd like to create some FOP Starter Documents. These are along the lines of our FOP Examples (they may 
actually end up on the Examples page), but would be geared more towards getting people started 
quickly and also resolving FAQs.

Starter Documents will enable users to get started quickly by just downloading the starter documents 
containing everything they need to create:
- even/odd pages w/ separate region-before/-after, page-numbers, etc.
- footnotes on page (and different last page footer/marker)
- tables (blind, vertical centering, etc.)
- bookmarks
- leaders
- graphics (instream-foreign-object svg & external-graphics)
- hyphenation

These so-called starter documents would include everything one would need, and also include ample 
comments (a veritable how-to!)... If anyone has any available, please post them to this issue.

creator: the.webmaestro@gmail.com
text:
I created this bug and assigned it to myself. Unfortunately, it didn't e-mail fop-dev when I did that. So I 
just unassigned myself (so fop-dev@ gets a copy), and am now re-assigning it to myself.

NOTE: If any of you have 'starter' documents to share, I *would* love to get your ideas and 
contributions on this.

creator: the.webmaestro@gmail.com
text: Please be sure to take a look at this bug, to see what it's about.
Reset assignee so mails go to list.
creator: markt@apache.org
